metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7050 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: SerializableProvider in RESTEasy in Red Hat Enterprise Linux Desktop 7, Red Hat Enterprise Linux HPC Node 7, Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server 7, and Red Hat Enterprise Linux Workstation 7 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

notes.Note: ebarretto> The SerializableProvider has been disabled by default in 3.0.17

criterions.comment: resteasy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
